tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Sra. Garc\xc3\xada encourages participation in the class. She does not require turning in the homework, but it does not mean that students do no need to do it.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: CARING  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: This is my first Spanish learning experience in my life. As a beginner, I really appreciated her well-organized lectures, a lot of homework assignments, clear explanation of grammatical topics with using whiteboards (and very neat). She memorized all student names and her class was very engaging. I was very lucky to have taken her class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is a great teacher. I have never thought that I could learn such a great amount of Spanish just for one semester. She was very organized for this Spanish 1 class, always used the textbook (which was helpful for me because I didn\'t know any Spanish at all), and gave us a lot of homework. Great learning experience for me and highly recommended.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: I really enjoyed Sra. Garcia\'s class. Students mentioned she\'s a bit disorganized, and I agree, but find it endearing. Part of her disorganization is because she\'s so relaxed. There were a lot of conversations that I would have been annoyed about if I were in her shoes, but she\'s really cool about it. She teaches well. She deserves a higher rating.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is one of the worst teachers I have EEVVVEERRR had... unless you already know basic Spanish DO NOT TAKE HER!!! She was very unhelpful and downright rude for the most part. She was very unclear in what she wanted and expected. Test review was moments prior to the test which was useless. I could go on but there is no room left! )

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: One of the better language teachers I have had. She keeps the class moving- before you know it 2.5 hrs have flown by. This class is ideal for professionals wanting to learn Spanish- it is challenging, fun, and flexible. She is disorganized at times, but everything in the class outline and chapters in the book are covered. Highly recommend.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I really enjoyed her class, she has lots of activities for the class and plays games to help conversate more with each other. For a beginner, I think it\'s really important, she does alot of review before the exams, her tests are easy if you listen to the review, she even goes to explain ENGLISH grammer to help us learn Spanish grammer, A++ maestra

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: LAZY. Doesn\'t collect or grade homework. Reviews new material an hour before the the test, and then that appears on the test. Doesn\'t give back final test because she reuses. Claims that we have to make an appt to see her nxt semester. Students don\'t have the opportunity to speak Spanish together in class--we speak to her only--and mostly listen.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: One of the best language teachers I have had. It is a pleasure to have a teacher speak Spanish all through the lesson. She prepares her lessons well, is thorough and very energetic. I loved her enthusiasm. Look forward to taking more classes with her in the future.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Absolutely LOVED her class. Classes were well run, conducted entirely in Spanish, and everyone in the class appeared to improve. Don\'t listen to the haters who probably don\'t want to work hard, so don\'t expect an easy ride. I\'m looking forward to another semester with her this Fall.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Easy test and work but the way she teach was bad dont recommend unless you want to learn stuff on your own. But her test was somewhat easy.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Terrible teacher. Don\'t waste your time. She is an awful teacher and is way to into herself. None of my classmates like her.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)

I FEEL LIKE I WOULD LEARN MUCH MORE IF I STAYED HOME AND WATCHED TELENOVELAS FOR 3 HOURS INSTEAD OF TAKING THIS CLASS. SHE NEEDS TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL TO LEARN HOW TO TEACH. DO NOT TAKE A CLASS WITH HER.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: she is very rude and unhelpful, She decided to move a text date 9 days ahead of the scheduled date and told everyone a lecture before the test. She complains about how the class is always behind, even when stuff has not been covered. She expects you to already know what she is going to teach. If you don\'t like to be put on blast DO NOT TAKE THIS

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I pick that she\'s easy because she gives us homework assignments but doesn\'t collect it and you don\'t do much in the class but talk. I don\'t like the way she teaches it\'s not good for people like me who have social anxiety. She makes it worse And on top of it, she is very rude. Most of the ppl in my class don\'t understand her and she moves to fast.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She assigns homework and doesn\'t collect it. She clearly doesn\'t prepare for her classes--she does only grammar review. She speaks no english, and aims her vocabulary and speed of speaking to the native speakers in the class. She likes being the center of attention, but I don\'t believe she\'s committed to her students the way really good profs are.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (3)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Una marravilla! She\'s one of the best teachers I\'ve had at CCSF; her lectures are clear, organized, and engaging, and her grading is straight forward. Take her for any spanish class! Highly recommended.
